definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: When you create mixed-language or portable programs.
sentences.chinese: 當您建立混合語言或可移植的程式時。

sentences.english: Comment: Consider common deployment scenarios and portability requirements.
sentences.chinese: 備註:考慮常用的部署場景和可移植性需求。

sentences.english: Some type definitions help make the code more portable.
sentences.chinese: 有些定義可以使代碼的可移植性更好。

sentences.english: Real portability can only be achieved among groups of similar devices.
sentences.chinese: 只能在多組類似設備之間實現真正的可移植性。

sentences.english: However, the increased flexibility comes at the price of decreased portability.
sentences.chinese: 然而，靈活性增加是以可移植性降低爲代價的。

sentences.english: In fact, the straightforwardness and portability renewed my appreciation for working with tape.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，爽直和可移植性再次感謝與磁帶。

sentences.english: Portability fixes which may help Aspell compile on other platforms.
sentences.chinese: 爲其他平臺上的編譯，進行可移植性修正。

sentences.english: Portability of aspect libraries across application servers.
sentences.chinese: 跨應用服務器的方面庫可移植性。

sentences.english: This high level of portability was integral to its popularity.
sentences.chinese: 這種高水平的可移植性是其流行普及所必需的。

sentences.english: This installment goes further into the portability issues.
sentences.chinese: 本文將進一步介紹可移植性問題。

sentences.english: This catenary control sys-tem is universal and transplantable.
sentences.chinese: 該垂度控制系統具有通用性和可移植性。

sentences.english: This helps reduce the development time and makes the solution more portable.
sentences.chinese: 這有助於減少開發時間，使解決方案更具可移植。

sentences.english: Data portability is where you can have real issues.
sentences.chinese: 數據可移植性是真正存在問題的地方。
不僅如此，它編出來的軟件是可移植的。
